scripts.build: npm --workspace @wpis/core run build && npm --workspace @wpis/adapter-arbitrum run build && npm --workspace @wpis/verifier run build && npm --workspace @wpis/react run build && npm --workspace @wpis/demo run build
scripts.test: npm --workspace @wpis/core run test && npm --workspace @wpis/adapter-arbitrum run test && npm --workspace @wpis/verifier run test && npm --workspace @wpis/react run test && npm --workspace @wpis/demo run test
scripts.dev: sh -c 'set -a; if [ -f .env ]; then . ./.env; elif [ -f .env.example ]; then . ./.env.example; fi; set +a; echo "Verifier API: http://localhost:${PORT:-4000}"; echo "Demo UI: http://localhost:3000"; concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n verifier,demo -c blue,green "npm --workspace @wpis/verifier run dev" "npm --workspace @wpis/demo run dev"'
scripts.dev:watch: sh -c 'set -a; if [ -f .env ]; then . ./.env; elif [ -f .env.example ]; then . ./.env.example; fi; set +a; echo "Verifier API (watch): http://localhost:${PORT:-4000}"; echo "Demo UI: http://localhost:3000"; concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n verifier,demo -c blue,green "npm --workspace @wpis/verifier run dev:watch" "npm --workspace @wpis/demo run dev"'
